Name: Fortress Building Puzzle
About the game: Fortress Building Puzzle is a puzzle game where you need to remove all the cubes to bring your castle to the ground, which is quite high. You can choose the degree of difficulty from 1 to 7 floors of cubes. Game Features: - Unlimited time to bring the castle to the ground, so at difficult levels you can stay for hours - All levels have a solution, and everything here is based on physics - Choose the degree of dificulty you want - Direct your view to the tower with the help of arrows from the keyboard or those from the screen
